snippet: A protective order requiring Busch to stay away from his former girlfriend was granted, and Nascar could discipline him if he is charged with domestic assault.
abstract: Delaware Family Court issues protective order against Nascar driver Kurt Busch in response to complaint filed by former girlfriend Patricia Driscoll; if state's district attorney's office decides to charge Busch with domestic assault he could be disciplined by Nascar.
lead_paragraph: A protective order requiring Busch to stay away from his former girlfriend was granted, and Nascar could discipline him if he is charged with domestic assault.

headline.main: Troubles Mount for Kurt Busch, Accused of Domestic Assault
headline.print_headline: Woes Mount for Driver in Abuse Case

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
